txt.en: Tower of Orthanc: Ring of Acid -- Tier 2

Saruman's evil has broken all boundaries of the Order of Wizards. Seeking to create more twisted creatures, he sealed many Orcs, Wargs, and Dunlendings in a chamber filled with acids and many vile poisons. Add a lesser ring of power, and the result was terrifying.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 in the acid wing of the Tower of Isengard Raid.</rgb>
